note.title: Capture Saetabis
note.text: Capture Saetabis to stop the Roman invasion in Iberia.

note.title: Protect Mons Herminus
note.text: Do not lose Mons Herminus else the peninsula is lost.

note.title: Viriato must survive
note.text: Viriato must survive in order for Rome to be defeated.

note.title: Gaul prisoner
note.text: You were told that the Romans brought a druid prisoner to this outpost. Freeing him might bring an unexpected advantage.

note.title: Roman camp
note.text: You were told that a number of Gauls have been caught prisoners in a Roman camp. Should you defeat the Roman garrison and free them, they might have a lot to offer in the battle against your common enemy.

note.title: Capture the shipyard
note.text: Gain control of the shipyard and use it to build a ship to search Larax with.

note.title: Find Larax
note.text: If Viriato manages to find Larax and convince him to join the Iberians, they will gain a powerful ally in the battle against the Romans.
